snippet.title: Arcade Laserdisc: US Vs. Them (1984 Mylstar Electronics)
snippet.description:
A shooting 'em up/flying chase game where you pilot a starship to protect the earth against alien ships. You will see frightened citizens and military personnel as intermissions throughout the game. The game takes place in San Francisco, Chicago, and Hollywood including the forests, mountains, and the desert terrains. 

Played on MAME 0.197. with built-in uncompressed AVI output.

Gameplay starts at 2:24

Note: Used infinite energy cheat after down to very low energy level.
